EmailTemplate.subject: How to keep your ATMs secure during COVID-19
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks to social distancing and branch closures, many outside ATMs are touchpoints for consumers—and criminals.
These ATMs are often unattended, opening the door to all kinds of increasing attacks, from logical attacks to card skimming, explosives and card trapping.
So how can you secure your unattended ATMs in the field?
Get the full guide to securing your ATMs during COVID-19 <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/banking/securing-your-atms-during-the-covid-19-pandemic]]>
Together, we’ll #keepcommercerunning safely.
Sincerely,
NCR Corporation
P.S. Checkout our dedicated page for coronavirus related resources <[[https://www.ncr.com/coronavirus/banking]]>. For more information on on ATM security, visit us online <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-self-service/endpoint-security]]> or contact NCR <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us?path=https://www.ncr.com/banking/atm-self-service/endpoint-security]]> or your local NCR representative.
